topic.title: SR 1: Automatic deployment of code generated by Design Studio into OCS Folders in Customization mode

section.title: Description
section.p: This feature introduces the capability to deploy to an OCS instance from Design Studio

The main functionalities are
Start/Stop the server
Deploy generated and non generated project to the server
Get logs on the Design Studio console

The two main objectives are
Reduce the number of server restart needed (translation, dataset modification)
Simple enough for BA to use it (no need for a technical guy to tweak things to make it works.

p.xref: Automatic deployment of code generated by Design Studio into OCS

ol.li:
Technical considerations
We choose not to use WTP as it was either not flexible enough to support our not-only-ear application with standard server definition, either too much work with from-scratch server implementation. Instead the implementation is based on an Eclipse builder and a Server View.
To fullfill the goal of minimizing the restarts necessary, we use the Weblogic hotdeploy feature called FastSwap. See FastSwap Oracle Documentation for more details.
A new Server View has been added to trigger server actions, such as stop/start the server, add/remove a project.
A new Console has been added to display OCS logs.
